description: A React functional component named NoteItem that displays a compact summary of a note, including title, content snippet, and last updated time, with options to open or delete the note.

methods.name: NoteItem({ note, onOpen, onDelete })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a note item with interactive elements to open or delete the note.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of the note after user confirmation.

ctags.name: NoteItem
ctags.pattern: /^export default function NoteItem({ note, onOpen, onDelete }) {$/
